reviewText: i have found this program to very helpful in the very limited amount of time that i have in my day.

I have been doing this program for about a year now and it just continues to create positive effects in my body. So much has changed in the last year it's hard to know where to begin? I have lost most all the 'middle age' fat that I had been trying to get rid of for the last 6 or 7 years. I now have a body that looks pretty much like it did about 30 years ago! I know that may sound unbelievable but it's true. And i have the pictures to prove it. Other things that have improved are my digestion, my skin tone, my muscle tone, my teeth are stronger, the list goes on & on... To make a long story short, if you want a way to improve your health all the way out from your core to your skin, then I'd say try Fit-150. It could be your ticket. It was for me!

This DVD is so very unique and enjoyable. It is very professionally done and really fun to do!  This is a wonderful opportunity to improve your overall health in a way that does not strain your body or mind.  For those of you who love meditations, there are two very powerful ones in this DVD.  And for those of you who love movement, you'll enjoy lots of that as well, done in a way that keeps the body/mind in a state of happiness.  I really highly recommend this DVD and can see that many people will benefit from experiencing it!  Thank you to those who made this a reality!
This really works!  My body looks more toned and I feel better.  And, for some reason, I don't want to eat as much.  Pounds come off, slow but steady...

There is so much in this video and most of it is really new and different. Not only that, it really works! I started losing weight right away and feeling blissful all day. I love that it works as long as I don't push into fatigue with it, so it's easy and fun. I can do it anywhere at any time, too. Useful knowledge, many techniques. Crazy wonderful!

Fit 150 Ideal Metabolism/Weight is truly a unique and FUN  approach to health and fitness - no matter what your body type or weight, you will attain your optimal balance and functioning of all your systems, including your attitude!
I've been doing this for only 3 months and I am not only losing weight but feel better, am less tired compared to working out like nuts, AND i'm less hungry!  Check it out.
